about_the_game:
You awaken on the Ritual Altar inside the Life Cathedral, with no memory or strength left. How long has it been? Who are you?

Venture down into the mountainous kingdom, loot dismal villages on the cliffside, navigate through spiralling stone dungeons and crypts, accumulate enough of the writhing Life Blood, and unseal the long-lost secrets hidden deep within the rock heart of the mountain.

Key Features:

  • Controlled Combat - A tense but rewarding combat system that requires quick reflexes and careful use of the game's mechanics.
  • Interconnected World - Find shortcuts, unlock doors, and activate elevators that aid your route across the cursed land.
  • Flexible Playstyle - Whether Sword, Axe or Dagger, different situations call for each weapon's unique set of attributes.
  • Exploration is Everything - Hidden paths and secret chests might house that single item you need to push forward - items are abundant but require a keen eye.
  • Shattered Storyline - From items to the characters you meet, the secrets of the past are waiting to be uncovered.
